title: Good work riot, that makes it 4 for 4 on you remaking ryze into a broken monstrosity.
body: 4 remakes is it?  Every time you find a new way to make him the most absurdly broken champ in the game and that is not easy, give your balance team a cookie.

replies.body:
except that his first rework didn't make him broken until riot buffed him, same for the 3rd

and to be honest, every ryze i saw weren't that good, instead of crying on a rework just wait some time so we can finally have a clear idea.

and don't ever do a thread about a champ without listing the problem they have. that's just a waste of energy and i hate it

I had a game where Ryze was almost useless, twice. His damage isn't insane and he can't root you in place for his full combo three times. He's really just good for helping your team escape or make an engage.

I guess that's just you. He seems easy to beat. can't delete you anymore so you just have to out damage him.
He is way healthier now than his perma root horseshit. That was fuckin broken. This is good and fun. You actually have to think about shit now
This last rework made him way easier to balance, riot had made fixed combo and interaction so they can nerf/buff his number more easily.
